statements: SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;

SELECT p.name, p.price, s.name AS supplier FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.product_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT p.name, c.name AS category FROM Products p JOIN Categories c ON p.product_id = c.category_id WHERE p.price BETWEEN 20 AND 100;
SELECT o.order_id, o.total_price, p.name AS product FROM Orders o JOIN Products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.total_price > 1000;
